languages.text: "Древний и могущественный {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, имя которому — Асдрубаэль Вект. Глава кабала Черного Сердца и властитель всего рода друкари. Для темных собратьев он подобен живому богу... Как твой {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}, восседающий на Золотом Троне, Вект восседает на троне из тьмы и страданий, удерживая разрозненные кланы Комморры от самоуничтожения. На твоем месте, элантах, я бы никогда не возжелала с ним встречи".

traits.locale_text: "Древний и могущественный {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, имя которому — Асдрубаэль Вект. Глава кабала Черного Сердца и властитель всего рода друкари. Для темных собратьев он подобен живому богу... Как твой {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}, восседающий на Золотом Троне, Вект восседает на троне из тьмы и страданий, удерживая разрозненные кланы Комморры от самоуничтожения. На твоем месте, элантах, я бы никогда не возжелала с ним встречи".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "An ancient and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} named Asdrubael Vect, the Supreme Overlord of the Kabal of the Black Heart who reigns over all of the Drukhari with an iron fist. My dark kin consider him to be a living god... Much like your {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} on the Golden Throne, Vect sits upon a throne of darkness and suffering that keeps Commorragh's disparate clans from disintegrating. I would not want to meet him if I were you, elantach."
languages.original_text: "Древний и могущественный {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, имя которому — Асдрубаэль Вект. Глава кабала Черного Сердца и властитель всего рода друкари. traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “是一位古老而强大的{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}，名叫阿斯德鲁拜尔·维克特。他是黑心阴谋团的至高霸主，靠着强大的铁腕统治着所有黑暗灵族。我那些邪恶的表亲认为他是位活生生的神明……就像你们黄金王座之上的{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}一样。维克特高坐在黑暗与痛苦的王座之上，让科摩罗的各个氏族不至于分崩离析。如果我是你，我绝不会想见到他，外界人。”
languages.original_text: "An ancient and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} named Asdrubael Vect, the Supreme Overlord of the Kabal of the Black Heart who reigns over all of the Drukhari with an iron fist. My dark kin consider him to be a living god... Much like your {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} on the Golden Throne, Vect sits upon a throne of darkness and suffering that keeps Commorragh's disparate clans from disintegrating. I would not want to meet him if I were you, elantach."

traits.locale_text: “是一位古老而强大的{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}，名叫阿斯德鲁拜尔·维克特。他是黑心阴谋团的至高霸主，靠着强大的铁腕统治着所有黑暗灵族。我那些邪恶的表亲认为他是位活生生的神明……就像你们黄金王座之上的{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}一样。维克特高坐在黑暗与痛苦的王座之上，让科摩罗的各个氏族不至于分崩离析。如果我是你，我绝不会想见到他，外界人。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "An ancient and powerful Drukhari named Asdrubael Vect, the Supreme Overlord of the Kabal of the Black Heart who reigns over all of the Drukhari with an iron fist. My dark kin consider him to be a living god... Much like your Emperor on the Golden Throne, Vect sits upon a throne of darkness and suffering that keeps Commorragh's disparate clans from disintegrating. I would not want to meet him if I were you, elantach."

languages.text: «Un {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} antiguo y poderoso llamado Asdrubael Vect, el Señor Supremo de la Kábala del Corazón Negro que gobierna a todos los Drukhari con mano de hierro. Mis primos oscuros lo consideran un dios en vida... De forma similar a tu {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} en su Trono Dorado, Vect se sienta en un trono de oscuridad y sufrimiento que evita que los dispares clanes de Commorragh se desintegren. De ser tú, haría lo posible por evitarlo, elantach».
languages.original_text: "An ancient and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} named Asdrubael Vect, the Supreme Overlord of the Kabal of the Black Heart who reigns over all of the Drukhari with an iron fist. My dark kin consider him to be a living god... Much like your {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} on the Golden Throne, Vect sits upon a throne of darkness and suffering that keeps Commorragh's disparate clans from disintegrating. I would not want to meet him if I were you, elantach."

traits.locale_text: «Un {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} antiguo y poderoso llamado Asdrubael Vect, el Señor Supremo de la Kábala del Corazón Negro que gobierna a todos los Drukhari con mano de hierro. Mis primos oscuros lo consideran un dios en vida... De forma similar a tu {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} en su Trono Dorado, Vect se sienta en un trono de oscuridad y sufrimiento que evita que los dispares clanes de Commorragh se desintegren. De ser tú, haría lo posible por evitarlo, elantach».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「アスドルバエル・ヴェクトという名の古代の強力な{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}だ。コルズ・ヴレックスのオーヴァーロードであり、全デュカーリをその力で支配している。我の闇の血族は、彼を生ける神とみなしている…黄金の玉座に座る{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のように。ヴェクトは闇と苦しみの玉座に座り、コモラフの分散された氏族を崩壊から守っているのだ。我がお前なら、彼には会いたくないと思うだろうよ。エランタ」
languages.original_text: "An ancient and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} named Asdrubael Vect, the Supreme Overlord of the Kabal of the Black Heart who reigns over all of the Drukhari with an iron fist. My dark kin consider him to be a living god... Much like your {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} on the Golden Throne, Vect sits upon a throne of darkness and suffering that keeps Commorragh's disparate clans from disintegrating. I would not want to meet him if I were you, elantach."

traits.locale_text: 「アスドルバエル・ヴェクトという名の古代の強力な{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}だ。コルズ・ヴレックスのオーヴァーロードであり、全デュカーリをその力で支配している。我の闇の血族は、彼を生ける神とみなしている…黄金の玉座に座る{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のように。ヴェクトは闇と苦しみの玉座に座り、コモラフの分散された氏族を崩壊から守っているのだ。我がお前なら、彼には会いたくないと思うだろうよ。エランタ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ein uralter und mächtiger {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} namens Asdrubael Vect, der Oberste Hochlord der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens, der mit eiserner Faust über alle Drukhari herrscht. Mein dunkles Volk verehrt ihn als lebende Gottheit ... Ähnlich wie Euer {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} auf dem Goldenen Throns sitzt Vect auf einem Thron der Dunkelheit und des Leids, der verhindert, dass Commorraghs uneinige Clans sich zerfallen. Ich an Eurer Stelle würde ihm nicht begegnen wollen, Elantach."
languages.original_text: "An ancient and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} named Asdrubael Vect, the Supreme Overlord of the Kabal of the Black Heart who reigns over all of the Drukhari with an iron fist. My dark kin consider him to be a living god... Much like your {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} on the Golden Throne, Vect sits upon a throne of darkness and suffering that keeps Commorragh's disparate clans from disintegrating. I would not want to meet him if I were you, elantach."

traits.locale_text: "Ein uralter und mächtiger {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} namens Asdrubael Vect, der Oberste Hochlord der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens, der mit eiserner Faust über alle Drukhari herrscht. Mein dunkles Volk verehrt ihn als lebende Gottheit ... Ähnlich wie Euer {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} auf dem Goldenen Throns sitzt Vect auf einem Thron der Dunkelheit und des Leids, der verhindert, dass Commorraghs uneinige Clans sich zerfallen. Ich an Eurer Stelle würde ihm nicht begegnen wollen, Elantach."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Un {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} ancien et puissant du nom d'Asdrubael Vect, le seigneur suprême de la Kabale du Cœur Noir qui règne d'une main de fer sur tous les Drukharis. Mes cousins noirs le considèrent comme un dieu vivant... À l'instar de votre {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} sur le Trône d'Or, Vect siège sur un trône de ténèbres et de souffrance qui préserve la cohésion des clans disparates de Commorragh. Si j'étais vous, elantach, j'espérerais ne jamais le rencontrer. »
languages.original_text: "An ancient and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} named Asdrubael Vect, the Supreme Overlord of the Kabal of the Black Heart who reigns over all of the Drukhari with an iron fist. My dark kin consider him to be a living god... Much like your {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} on the Golden Throne, Vect sits upon a throne of darkness and suffering that keeps Commorragh's disparate clans from disintegrating. I would not want to meet him if I were you, elantach."

traits.locale_text: « Un {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} ancien et puissant du nom d'Asdrubael Vect, le seigneur suprême de la Kabale du Cœur Noir qui règne d'une main de fer sur tous les Drukharis. Mes cousins noirs le considèrent comme un dieu vivant... À l'instar de votre {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} sur le Trône d'Or, Vect siège sur un trône de ténèbres et de souffrance qui préserve la cohésion des clans disparates de Commorragh. Si j'étais vous, elantach, j'espérerais ne jamais le rencontrer. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Asdrubael Vect adındaki kadim ve güçlü bir {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}. Kendisi, tüm Drukhariler üzerinde despotça hüküm süren Kara Yürek Kabalı'nın Yüce Efendisi'dir. Kara soydaşlarımın gözünde âdeta kanlı canlı bir tanrıdır. Tıpkı Altın Taht'ta oturan {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'unuz{/g} gibi Vect de karanlık ve ızdırapla örtülü bir tahtta oturarak Commorragh'ın envaiçeşit klanını dağılmaktan korur. Senin yerinde olsam onunla tanışmak istemezdim elantach."
languages.original_text: "An ancient and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} named Asdrubael Vect, the Supreme Overlord of the Kabal of the Black Heart who reigns over all of the Drukhari with an iron fist. My dark kin consider him to be a living god... Much like your {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} on the Golden Throne, Vect sits upon a throne of darkness and suffering that keeps Commorragh's disparate clans from disintegrating. I would not want to meet him if I were you, elantach."

Kara soydaşımın gözünde âdeta kanlı canlı bir tanrıdır. Tıpkı Altın Taht'ta oturan {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'unuz gibi Vect de karanlık ve ızdırapla örtülü bir tahtta oturarak Commorragh'ın envaiçeşit klanını dağılmaktan korur. Senin yerinde olsam onunla tanışmak istemezdim elantach."
